hints.content:
Every bill has a different value.

Dollar name | Picture | Value
- | - | -
One dollar bill | ![Front and back photo of one dollar bill.](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/526e9b19f2c39d0d908b6c531d510186f6e93e97.png) | $\$1$
Five dollar bill | ![Front and back photo of five dollar bill.](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/5069901d0226c2c5f1c3e73b2b5d7e48ee1e1eee.png) | $\$5$
Ten dollar bill | ![Front and back photo of ten dollar bill.](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/35b0286a92e1825d39af39b5e362e5d9674eb00d.png) | $\$10$
Twenty dollar bill | ![Front and back photo of twenty dollar bill.](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/66f0febd8ba41a0e3413f72b2f1fc2d54a3819de.png) | $\$20$

Let's label the value of each set of bills and find the total.

![1, five dollar bill. 3, one dollar bills.](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/df2cd9d9240eee1269d2b67ebd1d82c74253b7db.png)

$\begin{align}
& \underbrace{\$\purpleD{5}}_{\purpleD{1}{\text{ five dollar bill}}}   +\underbrace{\$\blueE{1}+\$\blueE{1} + \$\blueE{1}}_{\blueE{3}{\text{ one dollar bills}}}\\\\
&\underbrace{\$\purpleD{5}}_{\purpleD{1}{\text{ five dollar bill}}}   +\underbrace{\$\blueE{3}}_{\blueE{3}{\text{ one dollar bills}}}=\$8
\end{align}$

This set of bills has a value of $\$8$, so it is **not** equal to $\$80$.

![4, twenty dollar bills.](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/f7b656a0e22ff34081354df8b4c1c73efcab9b1b.png)

$\underbrace{\$\maroonD{20} +\$\maroonD{20} + \$\maroonD{20} +\$\maroonD{20}}_{\maroonD{4}{\text{ twenty dollar bills}}} =\$80$

This set of bills has a value of $\$80$, so it **is** equal to Zaya's amount of money.

Zaya could have this set of bills:

![4, twenty dollar bills.](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/f7b656a0e22ff34081354df8b4c1c73efcab9b1b.png)

question.content:
Zaya has $\$80$.

**Which set of bills could Zaya have?**

[[â˜ƒ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![1, ten dollar bill. 1, five dollar bill. 3, one dollar bills.](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/f3ce00298a63960007554158d7a90819012dcf23.png)
